steps.name: Step 10 : Click on Material master from left nav
Step 11 : Click on view dropdown icon
Step 12 : Click on Default view option
Step 13 : Click on add new record button
Step 14 : Click on Sequential Material flow
Step 15 : Verified Material Type field: ERSA -- Spare Part
Step 16 : Verified Material Group field: 31171504 -- Ball Bearings
Step 18 : Click on x-plant material status dropdown
Step 19 : Select option from x-plant material status dropdown
Step 21 : Click on Plant Data - add... button
